<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Random-forest">Random forest<a class="anchor-link" href="#Random-forest">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">## tune the random forest parameters. Runned in server</span>
<span class="n">t0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">rfr_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">RFR</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">cross_validation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">StratifiedKFold</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_splits</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">shuffle</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">parameter_grid</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s2">"n_estimators"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s2">"max_depth"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)}</span>
<span class="n">grid_search</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rfr_model</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_grid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">parameter_grid</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">cross_validation</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_jobs</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">grid_search</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xtr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ytr</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="n">grid_search</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_score_</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="n">grid_search</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="s2">"The time used"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">t0</span>


<span class="c1">#-0.0134198274734</span>
<span class="c1">#{'n_estimators': 90, 'max_depth': 5}</span>
<span class="c1">#The time used 1455.31491184</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>{'n_estimators': 90, 'max_depth': 5}</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [16]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">rfr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">RFR</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_estimators</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_depth</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rfr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xtr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ytr</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rfrpred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rfr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xte</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mserfr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">yte</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">rfrpred</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mserfr</span>
<span class="c1">#0.024127893096301516</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[16]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>0.02416135186839929</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [17]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Get the feature_importances_</span>
<span class="n">fea_import</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rfr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_importances_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Xtr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Feature_Importance"</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">by</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Feature_Importance"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ascending</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fea_import</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tail</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#plot the feature importance</span>
<span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fea_import</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">:,</span> <span class="p">:]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">barh</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">figsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"The feature importance from random forest"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [27]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Fit Ridge regression using selected variables.</span>
<span class="n">topvar</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fea_import</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">35</span><span class="p">:]</span>
<span class="n">Xtrtop</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Xtr</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">topvar</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">Xtetop</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Xte</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">topvar</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">alphas</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">logspace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#alphas = np.arange(20, 500, 10)</span>
<span class="n">rcv</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">RidgeCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alphas</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alphas</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">store_cv_values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">normalize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rcv</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xtrtop</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">ytr</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">cv_vals</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rcv</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cv_values_</span>
<span class="n">LOOr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cv_vals</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [28]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">figure</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">figsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">dpi</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alphas</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">LOOr</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'lambda'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Risk'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'LOO Risk for Ridge using 35 most important features'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlim</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="c1">#plt.ylim([0.006,0.010])</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [21]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">rcv_m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Ridge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rcv_m</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xtrtop</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ytr</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">yrcv</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rcv_m</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xtetop</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">yte</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">yrcv</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#0.024006242727057713</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[21]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>0.024029955353443745</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Adaboost-Regression">Adaboost Regression<a class="anchor-link" href="#Adaboost-Regression">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">## tune the adaboost parameters</span>
<span class="n">t0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">adr_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Adr</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">cross_validation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">StratifiedKFold</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_splits</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">shuffle</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">parameter_grid</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s2">"n_estimators"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s2">"learning_rate"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)}</span>

<span class="n">grid_search</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">adr_model</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_grid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">parameter_grid</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">cross_validation</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_jobs</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">grid_search</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xtr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ytr</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="n">grid_search</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_score_</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="n">grid_search</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span>
<span class="n">t1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="n">t1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">t0</span>

<span class="c1">#-0.0206233166963</span>
<span class="c1">#{'n_estimators': 10, 'learning_rate': 0.20000000000000001}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">adr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Adr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_estimators</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">learning_rate</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">adr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">adrpred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">adr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xte</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mseadr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">yte</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">adrpred</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mseadr</span>
<span class="c1">#0.02429095645996899</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[22]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>0.024313896064324478</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Xgboost-Regression">Xgboost Regression<a class="anchor-link" href="#Xgboost-Regression">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [24]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#use xgboost, note that xgboost only can handle DMatrix for Xtr</span>
<span class="n">Xtrmat</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Xtr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">as_matrix</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">t0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">xgb_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">XGBRegressor</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">cross_validation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">StratifiedKFold</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_splits</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">shuffle</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">parameter_grid</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'max_depth'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'n_estimators'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)}</span>
<span class="n">xgbgrid</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">xgb_model</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_grid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">parameter_grid</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">cross_validation</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_jobs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span> 
<span class="n">xgbgrid</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xtrmat</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">ytr</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="n">xgbgrid</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_score_</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="n">xgbgrid</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span>
<span class="n">t1</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">print</span> <span class="n">t1</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">t0</span>

<span class="c1">##-0.0326175522931</span>
<span class="c1">#{'n_estimators': 60, 'max_depth': 5}</span>
<span class="c1">#6173.87779903</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [25]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">xgbm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">XGBRegressor</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">max_depth</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_estimators</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">60</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">xgbm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xtrmat</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ytr</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">xgbpred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">xgbm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Xte</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">as_matrix</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="n">msexgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">yte</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">xgbpred</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">msexgb</span>
<span class="c1">#0.02412646260009974</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[25]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>0.02412646260009974</pre>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Conclusion">Conclusion<a class="anchor-link" href="#Conclusion">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>To summarize the results of different methods, we list the MSE calculated by each method with best parameters in the following table.</p>
<table>
<thead><tr>
<th style="text-align:center">Methods</th>
<th style="text-align:center">MSE</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">Linear Regression</td>
<td style="text-align:center">7.08697486847e+21</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">Ridge Regression</td>
<td style="text-align:center">0.0239840000665</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">Lasso Regression</td>
<td style="text-align:center">0.0240007795803</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">Linear SVM Regression</td>
<td style="text-align:center">0.0240299833173</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">Random Forest Regression</td>
<td style="text-align:center">0.02416135186839929</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">Ridge with selected features</td>
<td style="text-align:center">0.024029955353443745</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">Adaboost Regression</td>
<td style="text-align:center">0.024313896064324478</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">Xgboost Regression</td>
<td style="text-align:center">0.02412646260009974</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>From the table, it seems that ensembling method, i.e. random forest, and boosting methods do not outperform the linear methods with regularization, indicating the penalized linear ridge, lasso, and SVM may be sufficient to predict for this dataset.</p>
<p>With random forest regression, we got the importances of each features. The top ones include Tax_structure_Value, Finished_living_Area, Tax_total_Value, Tax_Amount, Total_living_Area, tran_month, Lot_Area, Taxable_land_Value, Year, tran_day, and etc. From the heatmap, we know that the Tax-related features are highly related. Tax amount, intuitively, should be another estimate of home value, which may systemically underestimate or overestimate the home value. So it makes sense that they appear in the top ones. Area-related features are also important and may dominate the difference between Zestimate and true sale price. Year, which represents the built year, is also in the top list. But it is surprising that transaction month and day are also in the important features. So the errors may be influenced by the seasons or beginning/end of the month. The underlying reasons need further study.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
